question: To which of the following the Constitution (98th Amendment) Act is related?
option1: Empowering the Centre to levy and appropriate service tax
option2: The constitution of the National Judicial Commission
option3: Readjustment of electoral constituencies on the basis of the Population Census 2001
option4: The demarcation of new boundaries between States
answer: Empowering the Centre to levy and appropriate service tax
explanation: The Constitution 98th Amendment Bill, 2003, seeks to constitute a National Judicial Commission (NJC) by including Chapter IV-A in Part V of the Constitution which will be in charge of appointing judges to the higher judiciary and for transferring High Court Judges.
